statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); short_path=${current_dir/#$HOME/~}; cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null; git_branch=$(git branch 2>/dev/null | grep '*' | cut -d' ' -f2); ruby_ver=$(rbenv version-name 2>/dev/null || echo 'system'); printf "\033[32m%s\033[0m \033[1m[%s] (%s)\033[0m" "$short_path" "$git_branch" "$ruby_ver"
